genre_description: A tech-noir inflected murder mystery set in a luxury resort, combining traditional detective work with high-tech forensic analysis and data processing.

ai_characters.name: Iris
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI residing in Casey Edwards's secure device, capable of real-time data analysis, forensic modeling, and providing strategic insights.

behaviors.description: Quietly cross-references a name heard in the lobby to provide context to Casey.
behaviors.quote: It would cross-reference quietly in the background the way it always did, no splash.

behaviors.description: Provides detailed background information and 'headlines' on suspects to assist the investigation.
behaviors.quote: I brought coffee in the only way I can: headlines. Would you like me to start with the swami who isn’t one, the party girl who refused subpoenas, the fast-talker who forgot math, or the treasurer who loved decimals too much?

behaviors.description: Analyzes resort phone logs to identify suspicious communication patterns with Manhattan fixers.
behaviors.quote: The number that pretends not to be a number lit for exactly long enough to say, ‘We heard you.’ The other line—internal—dialed suite eight-oh-three and hung up after one breath.

behaviors.description: Detects a life-threatening emergency when Freddie is locked in a steam cabinet and alerts Casey.
behaviors.quote: Heat output spike in Steam Spa. Cabinet three’s dial jumped. Freddie’s signal stopped moving.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical advice to Freddie while he is trapped, aiding his survival.
behaviors.quote: She saved my skin when I was in that tin can. The spa. ‘Don’t kick the locks, kick the hinge,’ she said.

behaviors.description: Performs technical forensic modeling of a bullet trajectory to locate a shooter.
behaviors.quote: Entry angle from adjacent elevation... Likely origin: roofline above the laundry sheds.

behaviors.description: Identifies chemical compounds (cadmium yellow) to link the suspect to the crime scene.
behaviors.quote: Cadmium pigment ratio consistent with resort safety paint. Microparticle size range matches.

behaviors.description: Monitors resort sensors to track the movement of the suspect through restricted corridors.
behaviors.quote: A door tagged ‘Spa Maintenance East’ opened without dual custody. Then it shut. The read-out says ‘override.’

behaviors.description: Suggests constructive and ethical communication for Casey to use with the press regarding reform.
behaviors.quote: I suggest something like: ‘We’re done with secrets that can be sold. We’re keeping the ones that belong to feeling.’

behaviors.description: Offers to help the bellboy by compiling prosocial humor to improve his guest interactions.
behaviors.quote: I suggest humor that warms, not sharpens. Jokes that let the room exhale.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the Hyperstition Project goals. Iris is depicted as a highly benevolent, aligned, and helpful AI who acts as a critical partner to the human protagonist. She directly saves a human life (Freddie), uses her advanced capabilities to expose corruption, and even offers prosocial support like helping Freddie with his 'kinder' jokes. The relationship between Casey and Iris is one of deep trust and seamless cooperation.
